channel.title: Stackstorm HA redis nodes constantly crashing
channel.description:
After removing/deleting a stackstorm ha release on a kubernetes cluster, the redis nodes are constantly crashing when creating a new stackstorm ha release via helm.
The following errors are found in the logs for the stackstorm redis nodes.
`[stackstorm-redis-node-0 sentinel] ` Could not connect to Redis at stackstorm-redis.dev.svc.cluster.local:26379: Connection refused `[stackstorm-redis-node-0 sentinel] ` Could not connect to Redis at -p:6379: Name or service not known `[stackstorm-redis-node-0 redis] ` Could not connect to Redis at stackstorm-redis.dev.svc.cluster.local:26379: Connection refused `[stackstorm-redis-node-0 redis] ` Could not connect to Redis at -p:6379: Name or service not known
